summary:
Scroll Manuscripts - Create your own Scrolls plus some other items!
Continuous Updates
descriptionHtml:
Create your own Scrolls plus some other misc. items. This Mod will have continuous updates, couple times a day at least. My on-going Project.

Install: Extract into your Data folder, check ScrollScripts_v3.esp and Load Loose Files.
Uninstall: Delete the .esp!

[WIP] - Recent News*
-----------------
- Uploaded v3 Change log below.
- Sneak Peek: Working on a new Mod that will include new re-textured Armor, Weapons and Miscellaneous items. Going to also be balancing out Damage/Armor values in the game.

v3
-----------------
- Added 7 new Scrolls:
-- Scroll of Oakflesh
-- Scroll of Ironflesh
-- Scroll of Dragonhide
-- Scroll of Invisibility
-- Scroll of Magelight
-- Scroll of Waterbreathing
-- Conjure Familiar

v2
-----------------
- Scrolls will no longer use Charcoal to make. This has been replaced with filled Soul Gems.
- Miscellaneous Recipes are now visible. No longer will it require you to have one or more the required item(s) to view the Recipe.

v1
-----------------
Note: Some items may be hidden until 1 or greater of the materials are in your inventory. (Misc items)

- Over 35 items to be Crafted!
- Craft Scrolls from Novice to Master.
- Craft Scrolls with the use of Charcoal, Inkwells, Paper and Quills. Rarer Scrolls may use other       items as well.
- More Scrolls being added.
- Smelt down Dwarven Ingots to Dwarven Oil for use with Inkwells.
- Smelt Firewood to create Charcoal.
- Quills can be found as is or from \"tanning\" various feathers found in the game.
- Paper can be found as is or from \"tanning\" a couple of ruined books.
- Constant balancing and re-works in progress. Thrall Scrolls are currently available. Please let me know if they are too easy to Craft.**

List
-----------------
Scroll of Firebolt
Scroll of Fireball
Scroll of Fire Rune
Scroll of Flame Cloak
Scroll of Fire Storm
Scroll of Flame Thrall
Scroll of Ice Spike
Scroll of Frost Rune
Scroll of Frost Cloak
Scroll of Ice Storm
Scroll of Blizzard
Scroll of Ice Thrall
Scroll of Lightning Bolt
Scroll of Lightning Rune
Scroll of Lightning Cloak
Scroll of Chain Lightning
Scroll of Storm Thrall
Scroll of Fast Healing
Scroll of Cure Wounds
Scroll of Grand Healing
Scroll of Heal Other
Scroll of Guardian Circle
Scroll of Turn Lesser Undead, more...
Scroll of Conjures, more...
more...

Misc
-----------------
Recipe for Paper, Inkwells, Oil, Charcoal and more...

Legend
-----------------
* This section is recent news or upcoming projects. Trying to keep it updated daily!
** Balancing may need tweaking. If anybody is testing this on a play-through and find some scrolls too easy or hard to get let me know. Thanks!
author: Reptoon
